snippet: Extreme weather? A cute baby animal? A meteor? Glaciers? An ugly or bizarre mammal, sea creature, plant or insect? Giant trees? The northern lights? An amazing rock formation? A frog failing to catch a dragonfly? Look at these photos, then tell us...
abstract: Extreme weather? A cute baby animal? A meteor? Glaciers? An ugly or bizarre mammal, sea creature, plant or insect? Giant trees? The northern lights? An amazing rock formation? A frog failing to catch a dragonfly? Look at these photos, then tell us what you’ve seen.

headline.main: What's the Coolest Thing You've Ever Seen in Nature?
